text: Need Sarah Chen for Nando's campaign. Budget around $14,101, looking for 1 x Instagram reel, 2 x Brand photoshoot, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Twitter post. 10 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
